Posts.Content: Jan 20, 2009 07:18PM leslie1024 wrote: I am sorry that you have to think about this. I am in the same boat except, I am BRCA negative. I have had multiple lumpectomies, all benign. My mom died 14 years ago. Every year I have the recommended screening and every year something new but not worrisome is found. I am tired of being scared and worried. But also feel that maybe I am too much of a worrier and it would be making a big deal out of nothing. Keep me informed about what you find.
Posts.Title: Bi-lateral prof mast? runalot08 runalot08
